about_the_game:
Lore

In a universe where Morse Code always existed, it is your task to compete against all other forms of communication throughout history, from horse to train. You must prove that morse is, and always will be, the ultimate method of communication. And you'll learn how to use real morse code along the way.

Gameplay

  • Transmit messages using authentic morse code.

  • Race against other forms of communication.

  • Pick up the skill of morse code while playing.

Content

  • 27 unique levels, spanning 3 different maps: Arabia, England, USA.

  • Levels are designed to challenge you in multiple ways: speed, tactics and accuracy.

  • Build and play custom levels with a built-in editor, using Steam Workshop.

  • Endless mode, to test your skills even further.
